name: Vorpal Squall (Part 1)
description:
Living in a secluded corner of the world and cut off from the general population, Darkbloods live a modest life in a forest settlement. Valstrom's journey begins when his friend is chased by monsters, but his attempts to rescue him soon spiral into a much greater problem, as the prejudice the Darkbloods face rears its ugly head in shocking and inhumane ways.

This game was created as part of a university assignment, and focusses heavily on portraying a story to the audience. I hope you enjoy the beginning of the story I am trying to tell.

(Game contains mild language and cursing).

Controls

Menu – X, Esc

Action – Z, Enter, Space

Cancel – X, Esc

Movement – Arrow Keys, Click

Dash – Shift
